tool_description: Generates purchase orders based on inventory requirements, supplier selection, and business rules, integrating reorder points with supplier capabilities.

product_sku.description: Product SKU to generate purchase order for

reorder_point.description: Calculated reorder point for this product

preferred_supplier_id.description: Preferred supplier ID; if not provided, system selects best supplier

priority_level.description: Order priority: low, medium, high, urgent

split_order_allowed.description: Whether order can be split across multiple suppliers

error_messages: Product not found: The specified SKU does not exist in the product catalog.
Invalid inventory values: current_inventory, reorder_point, and economic_order_quantity must be non-negative.
No suitable supplier: No suppliers meet the cost and delivery requirements.
Supplier not available: The preferred_supplier_id is not available or qualified for this product.
Invalid priority level: priority_level must be one of [low, medium, high, urgent].
Invalid delivery date: required_delivery_date must be in the future.
usage: Provide product_sku, current inventory levels, reorder_point, and economic_order_quantity. Optionally specify supplier preferences, cost limits, and delivery requirements.

selected_supplier_id.description: ID of the supplier selected for this order

total_cost.description: Total order cost including taxes and fees
